channel.title: 🏢 North University of China on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 North University of China on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: SpeAr: A Spectral Approach for Zero-Shot Node Classification
item.description: SpeAr: A novel spectral approach significantly improves zero-shot node classification by using inherent graph structure to reduce prediction bias and effectively identifying unseen node classes.
